name: Relaxing Asteroids
description:
Asteroids. Relaxing. Console.

Those are the three keywords that contributed to the making of this game. Well also simple, even though it turned out not to be so simple.

There is no possibility to pass this game - it simple doesn't have any ending nor any way to score any score. It is all about going around in your tiny ship and destroying countless asteroids heading at you. It is meant for you to admire the art of randomly throwing few colors together in order to make a so called pixel art and making a game with interesting features fully playable inside of default Windows Console - cmd.exe.

Controls
  • Use WSAD to move
  • Use SPACE to shoot
  • On top of the screen, there is a button you can press to regen your HP
